EmailTemplate.name: Event - Roadshow - Accelerate 2014.Email Receipt.Roadshow Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Accelerate Roadshow: Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for your Roadshow registration. Here are your confirmation details:
Location:
{{lead.Roadshow.city:default=edit me}}
Schedule:
{{lead.Roadshow.schedule:default=edit me}}
Address:
{{lead.Roadshow.address:default=edit me}}
This invitation-only event is a great opportunity to network with cross-industry CIO’s & IT Heads.
We are looking forward to see you there.
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team
